caption.p: Oregano EO exhibited the largest inhibition zone among the tested oils. Antibacterial activity of the screened EOs using agar disc diffusion method against ( a) S. epidermidis with EOs at concentration of 0.7%; ( b) S. epidermidis with EOs at concentration of 1.4%; ( c) P. acnes with EOs at concentration of 0.7%; ( d) P. acnes with EOs at concentration of 1.4%. Data is represented as means of inhibition zones (mm) Â± SD. Controls used were clindamycin and erythromycin as positive control, while DMSO as negative control.
